attributes.action: Stop the Greater Manchester Spacial Framework Plan on our Greenbelt
attributes.additional_details:
The community in Rochdale, Milnrow & Littleborough has long documented objection and frustration at current Government proposals, under the Greater Manchester Spacial Framework plan, and developments by Homes England.

These communities reject the plans without the infrastructure to support them. This should be discussed in parliament, local councils are being forced to implement plans to meet government housing quotas. 

Save our Greenbelt
attributes.background: The people of Rochdale, Littleborough strongly object to the Government development of ‘affordable’ housing in Littleborough, Rochdale and are being shunned and misrepresented by their local council, they are being denied means to object and wish to have their views represented in parliament

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about things that are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

The Greater Manchester Spatial Framework is the responsibility of Greater Manchester Combined Authority. You can find out how to take part in Greater Manchester Combined Authority's consultation here:

https://www.greatermanchester-ca.gov.uk/what-we-do/housing/greater-manchester-spatial-framework/gmsf-consultation/
